AI Description: Intel Threading Building Blocks (TBB) is a widely-used C++ template library for multicore programming that provides rich features for parallel programming. It offers a high-level abstraction for expressing parallelism to help developers create scalable, high-performance applications.
Core Features: Task Scheduling, Data Parallelism, Parallel Algorithms, Concurrent Containers, Memory Management
General Tags: Multicore Programming, Parallel Computing, C++ Library, High Performance Computing
